bs-readers-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of readers extension.
prefs-readers:
Used in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], headline for readers section in preferences.
{{Identical|Reader}}
bs-readers-title:
Headline below content for readers section
*$1 is the number of readers for PLURAL distinction
*$2 is the username of the user - use for GENDER distinction (singular only)
{{Identical|Reader}}
readers-user:
Special page title for pages {{GENDER:$1|read}} by: $1

* $1 is the username - use for GENDER distinction
readers:
Special page title for readers of "$1"
*$1 is the page name
bs-readers-contentactions-label:
Anchor text for display readers
{{Identical|Display readers}}
bs-readers-pagenotexists: Error text on special page for page does not exist.
bs-readers-pref-active: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], checkbox label for activate readers
bs-readers-pref-numofreaders: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], label for number of readers to display:
bs-readers-emptyinput: Error text on special page for no page has been provided.
bs-readers-header-readerspath:
Used on special page, headline for reader
{{Identical|Reader}}
